Description: Define goals, scope, and stakeholders for the Real-Time Chat Application
Analyze technical, financial, and operational feasibility for the project
Collect functional and non-functional requirements from stakeholders
Divide the project into manageable modules and submodules
Plan timeline and dependencies using PERT and Gantt charts
Assign team roles, tools, and technologies
Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies
Develop WebSocket-based real-time chat functionality
Implement secure user login, registration, and session management
Design schema for users, messages, and groups
Implement group creation and group messaging functionality
Enable file uploads and downloads within chat
Integrate real-time push notifications for new messages
Execute manual and automated test cases in Zephyr
Perform re-testing after code or feature updates
Test system performance with 1000+ concurrent users
Test for data encryption and vulnerability checks
Monitor sprint velocity, bug trends, and test coverage
Document and approve any project scope changes
Deploy application to production server and perform smoke testing
Collect feedback and measure success metrics
Compile project documents, manuals, and final reports
